newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore MAS accepts invitation to be BIS member.
newsitem.headline: Singapore MAS accepts invitation to be BIS member.

text.p: The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) said on Tuesday it is accepting an invitation to become a member of the Bank for International Settlements (BIS).
"MAS is pleased to accept the BIS' invitation to become its member," it said in a statement.
